EdgeCaseNotes: CAD case number drives merge; all CAD records should have corresponding RMS record

PrecedenceRules: Fill RMS.Location if NULL; CAD address takes precedence
EdgeCaseNotes: CAD address more current; RMS may lag behind CAD updates

PrecedenceRules: Map CAD.Incident to RMS incident types via lookup
EdgeCaseNotes: CAD incident may need to be split into multiple RMS incident types
RMS uses date-only field; time component in separate field

ValidationRule: Vocabulary differs between systems; maintain mapping table

PrecedenceRules: Map CAD disposition codes to RMS codes
Extract first officer from comma-separated list
EdgeCaseNotes: CAD may have multiple officers; RMS wants primary officer only

PrecedenceRules: Map CAD zones to RMS beats: Z1 → Beat1
Map CAD grids to RMS sectors
Copy CADNotes to RMS.OfficerNotes if RMS field is NULL
EdgeCaseNotes: Preserve CAD dispatcher notes in RMS
